00013 template<class T>
00014 SprTable<T>::SprTable(int size) : _size(size)
00015 {
00016   _ntable = (NList*)malloc(size * sizeof(NList));
00017   for (int i = 0; i < size; ++i)
00018     _ntable[i]._pos = (int*)malloc(size * sizeof(int));

00021 template<class T>
00022 SprTable<T>::~SprTable()
00023 {
00024   for (int i = 0; i < _size; ++i)
00025     free(_ntable[i]._pos);
00026   free(_ntable);
00027 }

00032 template<class T>
00033 void SprTable<T>::resize(int size)
00034 {
00035   if (_size == 0)
00036   {
00037     _ntable = (NList*)malloc(size * sizeof(NList));
00038     for (int i = 0; i < size; ++i)
00039       _ntable[i]._pos = (int*)malloc(size * sizeof(int));
00040   }
00041   else if (size > _size)
00042   {
00043     _ntable = (NList*)realloc(_ntable, size * sizeof(NList));
00044     for (int i = 0; i < size; ++i)
00045       _ntable[i]._pos = (int*)realloc(_ntable[i]._pos, size * sizeof(int));
00046   }
00047   _size = size;
00048 }

00075 template<class T>
00076 int SprTable<T>::loadTree(const UPTree<T>& tree, const BracketTable<T>& 
00077                             btable)
00078 {
00079   int i;
00080     
00081   for (i = 0; i < _size; ++i)
00082   {
00083     if (tree[i].myType() == LEAF || tree[i].myType() == LB) 
00084     {
00085       loadSubtree(tree, i, btable);
00086     }
00087     else
00088     {
00089       _ntable[i]._num = 0;
00090     }
00091   }
00092   return 0;
00093 }
00094 
00098 template<class T>
00099 int SprTable<T>::loadSubtree(const UPTree<T>& tree, int pos, 
00100                              const BracketTable<T>& btable)
00101 {
00102   assert(tree[pos].myType() == LB || tree[pos].myType() == LEAF);
00103 
00104   int i = pos;
00105   int j;
00106 
00107   while (_stack.size())
00108     _stack.pop();
00109 
00110   _ntable[i]._num = 0;
00111 
00112   // search to the left.
00113   for (j = i - 1; j > 0; --j)
00114   {
00115     if (tree[j].myType() == RB)
00116     {
00117       _stack.push(j);
00118     }
00119     else if (tree[j].myType() == LB)
00120     {
00121       if (_stack.size() && tree[_stack.top()].myType() == RB)
00122       {
00123         _stack.pop();
00124         if (_stack.size() >= 2)
00125         {
00126           _ntable[i]._pos[_ntable[i]._num++] = j;
00127         }
00128       }
00129       else
00130       {
00131         if (_stack.size() >= 2)
00132         {
00133           _ntable[i]._pos[_ntable[i]._num++] = j;
00134         }
00135         _stack.push(j);
00136       }
00137     }
00138     else
00139     {
00140       if (_stack.size() >= 2)
00141       {
00142         _ntable[i]._pos[_ntable[i]._num++] = j;
00143       }
00144     }
00145   }
00146       
00147   // search to the right
00148   while (_stack.size())
00149     _stack.pop();
00150       
00151   if (tree[i].myType() == LEAF)
00152     j = i + 1;
00153   else
00154     j = btable[i].pos[1] + 1;
00155   for (; j < _size; ++j)
00156   {
00157     if (tree[j].myType() == LB)
00158     {
00159       if (_stack.size() >= 2)
00160       {
00161         _ntable[i]._pos[_ntable[i]._num++] = j;
00162       }
00163       _stack.push(j);
00164     }
00165     else if (tree[j].myType() == RB)
00166     {
00167       if (_stack.size() && tree[_stack.top()].myType() == LB)
00168         _stack.pop();
00169       else
00170         _stack.push(j);
00171     }
00172     else
00173     {
00174       if (_stack.size() >= 2)
00175       {
00176         _ntable[i]._pos[_ntable[i]._num++] = j;
00177       }
00178     }
00179   }
00180   return _ntable[i]._num;
00181 }
